excerpt: "Implementation and example training scripts of various flavours of graph neural network in TensorFlow 2.0. Much of it is based on the code in the tf-gnn-samples repo. You can install the tf2_gnn module from the Python Package Index using pip install tf2_gnn. Alternatively (for example, for development), you can check out this repository ..."
